quote: Always look ahead, but never look back.
author: Miles Davis

quote: Don't look back, you can never look back.
author: Don Henley

quote: Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I never look back, darling.|It distracts from the now.
author: Walt Disney

quote: There are far, far better things ahead|than any we leave behind.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: It is not possible to go forward while looking back.
author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: When a thing is done, it's done. Don't look back.|Look forward to your next objective.
author: George C. Marshall

quote: I tend not to look back.|It's confusing.
author: Walter Hill
